Instruction: Slice the baguette into 1/2-inch thick slices.
Arrange the baguette slices on a baking sheet and brush them with olive oil.
Bake the baguette slices in the preheated oven for 8-10 minutes, or until lightly toasted.
While the baguette slices are toasting, cut the peaches into thin wedges.
Spread goat cheese on each toasted baguette slice.
Wrap each peach wedge with a slice of prosciutto.
Place a wrapped peach wedge on top of each goat cheese-covered baguette slice.
Drizzle honey over the peach and prosciutto crostini.
Sprinkle fresh thyme leaves over the crostini.
Serve the peach and prosciutto crostini immediately as a savory-sweet side dish or appetizer.
